name: Aldrigo's World Fight
description:
Satirical fighting game

This was the first game I have ever made, so just enjoy as it is.

Commands (keyboard):

a = punch

d = special attack

z = final move

w = charge energy (blue bar)

r = awakening (< 50% health also an R appears near your bar)

s = awakening special move

i = jump

j = left

l = right

Xbox controller supported!
